title: Brown rot
creator_credit: J.V. Durden, Stephen Ackroyd and Shell Film Unit
brief_description: Shows the nature and extent of the fruit disease know as “brown rot”. Illustrations include initial infection of the fruit; development of the mycelium and fruit bearing bodies, conidiophores; growth rings found in the affected areas of the fruit; transfer of the disease from fruit to fruit.
